title: The general history of the Reformation of the Church from the errors and corruptions of the Church of Rome, begun in Germany by Martin Luther with the progress thereof in all parts of Christendom from the year 1517 to the year 1556 / written in Latin by John Sleidan ; and faithfully englished. To which is added A continuation to the Council of Trent in the year 1562 / by Edward Bohun.
author: Sleidanus, Johannes, 1506-1556.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Edw. Jones for Abel Swall and Henry Bonwicke,
